meanings.definition: A person who has an uncontrollable impulse to start fires.
meanings.sent1: The pyromaniacs were caught setting a building on fire.
meanings.sent2: The police were called to investigate the group of pyromaniacs in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The pyromaniacs accidentally set off the fire alarm during their failed attempt to light a campfire.
meanings.sent4: Her love for candles was so intense, it was as if she was a pyromaniac for wax.
meanings.sent5: The image of the pyromaniacs dancing around the flames was etched in his memory.
